Be available to meet in person every Friday during the semester from 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM
Attend monthly Board of Director meetings and Committees (2 to 3 times a month)
Attend Board Orientation (August prior to class startw
Serve on at least two assigned sub-committees
Run for Chair and/or Vice Chair (meet weekly with the Executive Director)
As an undergraduate member, you must maintain a 3.0 GPA each semester of each term
As a graduate member, you must maintain a 3.0 GPA each semester of each term
